channel.title: Tenants and multi-tenant apps :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Tenants and Multi-tenant apps Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Page ID: 753 Is this a new page?: New doc with new content but also pulling from existing content Target personas: Internal app builders, Saas Builder Description: This is a new doc defining what a tenant and multi-tenancy are why it can be good to divide users up into tenants internally what a multi-tenant OIDC app is, or how an app is considered to be multi-tenant at a very high level, how an app knows which tenant to use when a user wants to sign in.
